name: XYZwithErikZachary
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Hosted by renowned television and radio host, Erik Zachary, and joined by music industry talents, Jordan Foster & Trace Hamilton, XYZ with Erik Zachary is an escape from ordinary radio. Do we talk? Yes. Is there music? Yep. But don't get it twisted, this is not your parents radio show... even though Erik's Mom does provide weekly hot takes
XYZ's goal is simple. To take everything that made you reach for the aux cord and lock it out of the studio.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
